I am Singing Wind, Chief of the Martians. I feel like I was mauled by Jesus. Our love isn't any different from yours, except it's hotter, because I'm involved. That's not soon enough! I've got to find a way to escape the horrible ravages of youth. Suddenly, I'm going to the bathroom like clockwork, every three hours. And those jerks at Social Security stopped sending me checks. Now 'I'' have to pay ''them'!

I am Singing Wind, Chief of the Martians. It's toe-tappingly tragic! Yeah, I do that with my stupidness. I'm sorry, guys. I never meant to hurt you. Just to destroy everything you ever believed in. I saw you with those two "ladies of the evening" at Elzars. Explain that.

Hello, little man. I will destroy you! Ooh, name it after me! I feel like I was mauled by Jesus. Say it in Russian! Then throw her in the laundry room, which will hereafter be referred to as "the brig".
